evidence.source_document: Fifth Amended Complaint and Jury Demand
evidence.text: WHEREFOR, Plaintiffs respectfully request that the Court: a.  Certify the action as a class action pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23 and appoint Plaintiffs as class representatives and the lawyers of Oliver Law Group and Calderon Law as class counsel respectively;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Certify the action as a class action pursuant to Fed. R. Civ. P. 23 and appoint Plaintiffs as class representatives and the lawyers of Oliver Law Group and Calderon Law as class counsel respectively

evidence.source_document: Fifth Amended Complaint and Jury Demand
evidence.text: b.  Adjudge and declare that the acts, omissions, policies, and practices of Defendants personally, and their agents, employees, officials, and all persons acting in concert with them under color of state law

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Adjudge and declare that the acts, omissions, policies, and practices of Defendants personally, and their agents, employees, officials, and all persons acting in concert with them under color of state law

evidence.source_document: Fifth Amended Complaint and Jury Demand
evidence.text: c.  Issue a judgment against Defendants in an amount to be determined at trial, including compensatory and punitive damages in an amount that is fair, just, and reasonable and will hold Defendants liable for the civil rights violations alleged.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Issue a judgment against Defendants in an amount to be determined at trial, including compensatory and punitive damages in an amount that is fair, just, and reasonable and will hold Defendants liable for the civil rights violations alleged

evidence.source_document: Fifth Amended Complaint and Jury Demand

evidence.text: WHEREFORE, PREMISES CONSIDERED, Defendants respectfully request that this Court grant their Motion to Dismiss and enter an order dismissing the all claims against them.

extracted.value: Defendant: Request dismissal of all claims against them (motion to dismiss)

evidence.text: Defendants further pray for such other general relief that this Court deems appropriate.

extracted.value: Defendant: Pray for such other general relief that this Court deems appropriate

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial
evidence.text: e.  Retain jurisdiction of this case until Defendants have fully complied with the orders of this Court, and there is a reasonable assurance that Defendants will continue to comply in the future absent continuing jurisdiction; and

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Retain jurisdiction of this case until Defendants have fully complied with the orders of this Court, and there is a reasonable assurance that Defendants will continue to comply in the future absent continuing jurisdiction; and

evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint and Demand for Jury Trial
evidence.text: f.  Grant Plaintiffs such other relief as the Court deems appropriate and just.

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Grant Plaintiffs such other relief as the Court deems appropriate and just.

evidence.source_document: Defendants' Motion to Sever Claims into Separate Civil Actions or Alternatively for Separate Trials
evidence.text: Defendants respectfully request that the Court sever each of the 14 Plaintiffs’ claims into 14 separate civil actions.

extracted.value: Defendant: Sever each of the 14 Plaintiffs’ claims into 14 separate civil actions

evidence.source_document: Defendants' Motion to Sever Claims into Separate Civil Actions or Alternatively for Separate Trials
evidence.text: Alternatively, if the Court does not order that the claims be severed into 14 completely separate actions, Defendants request that the Court order that there be separate trials for each of the 14 Plaintiffs.

extracted.value: Defendant: Order separate trials for each of the 14 Plaintiffs if severing is not ordered

evidence.source_document: Defendants' Motion to Sever Claims into Separate Civil Actions or Alternatively for Separate Trials
